This page provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**F1.7 Large lowland rivers**](/efg-info/F1_7.qmd). For older or alternative maps, see [here](/map-info/F1_7_history.qmd).

## Methods

Here is the methods summary for **Map code and version**: F1.7.web.orig v2.0.

> The distribution of large lowland rivers was taken from the Global River Classification database (Ouellet Dallaire et al. 2018). Reaches with flow > 10,000 m3/s were mapped with a 20 km buffer as major occurrences, clipped to exclude those with seasonal freezing temperatures (mean temperature of coldest quarter <0Â°C).

## How to use the data

### Available files

:::{.aside}

Following maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group. `Web navigation` maps are optimised for use in webapps, but they have similar methods and differ only in details of format and processing. 

- Web navigation (**code: F1.7.web.orig**, version v2.0) 
 - Indicative Map (**code: F1.7.IM.orig**, version v2.0) 


:::
